entries.journal_entry_description: Dahlia Damask, the Lady Reverend of the Society, has thrown you into the thick of danger with her blind promises of revenge. Find Sertild near the Kerritamba village and speak with him. It would be wise to bring your most trusted allies.
entries.journal_entry_title: The Road to Exemplar: The Final Battle
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Survive the Final Battle! Find Sertild near the Kerritamba village, in the brush overlooking the training grounds of the Kerritamba warriors. He will give you further instructions.
